info.name: my maps are like those toys you see at mall vendors that look really cool, so you buy one. Then when you get home and start playing with it you quickly find out that it's a piece of shit. You were so hyped about it that you have trouble accepting that it is indeed a piece of shit. There is no doubt about it, it is a piece of shit. It cost you $40 and it is a piece of shit. Maybe you can justify that the excitement you had was worth the money... but it still is a piece of shit.
info.author: Anonymous
